resources.string: A blood red helmet is an essential symbol of a chaos warrior.
You do not have enough mana to cast a \"%1$s\" spell.
Summons an undead follower. Deathling\'s hp and damage grows with hero level. \n\nSummon limit: %1$d (+ 1 every Magic Level)
Ignites the selected cell. Can be used to burn grass, characters and objects.
Roots the selected character, making it unable for him to move for a short period of time.
Summons a gust of wind, that pushes the selected character away.
Freezes the selected character, making it unable to perform any actions for a short period of time.
A spell that produces light, to illuminate the dark levels of the dungeon.
This spell is crucial for any adventurer. It will restore 1/3 of the maximum amount of the caster\'s hp.
This ancient tome is filled with arcane riddles and mysteries! It may be hard to read, but if you\'ll get through it, you\'ll definitely increase your magical powers.
It looks more like a compilation of assorted pages that were sewed together, than an actual book. You might be able to make something out of it if you\'ll pay enough attention.
Within these pages you\'ve discovered a full text of a \"%1$s\" spell.\n\" %2$s \"
This potion will restore your spiritual energy.
It\'s an indispensable item in the dungeon, which is notorious for it\'s poor ambient lighting.
This metal band is adorned with a large %s gem that glitters in the darkness. Who knows what effect it has when worn?
you are now familiar enough with your %1$s to identify it. It is %2$s.
You can only wear 2 rings at a time
Your %s tightens around your finger painfully
, and because it is cursed, you are powerless to remove it.
%1$s\n\nYou can feel a malevolent magic lurking within the %2$s.
This ring increases your chance to hit the enemy.

Wearing this ring will allow the wearer to notice hidden secrets - traps and secret doors - without taking time to search. Degraded rings of detection will dull your senses, making it harder to notice secrets even when actively searching for them.
This ring provides resistance to different elements, such as fire, electricity, gases etc. Also it decreases duration of negative effects.
This ring increases your chance to dodge enemy attack.

In fact this ring doesn\'t provide any magic effect, but it demonstrates to shopkeepers and vendors, that the owner of the ring is a member of The Thieves\' Guild. Usually they are glad to give a discount in exchange for temporary immunity guarantee. Upgrading this ring won\'t give any additional bonuses.
This ring accelerates the wearer\'s flow of time, allowing one to perform all actions a little faster.
This ring increases your chance to gather dew and seeds from trampled grass.
This ring increases the body\'s regenerative properties, allowing one to recover lost health at an accelerated rate. Degraded rings will decrease or even halt one\'s natural regeneration.
Your wands will become more powerful in the energy field that radiates from this ring. Degraded rings of power will instead weaken your wands.
Wearing this ring you can go without food longer. Degraded rings of satiety will cause the opposite effect.
Enemies will be less likely to notice you if you wear this ring. Degraded rings of shadows will alert enemies who might otherwise not have noticed your presence.
Though this ring doesn\'t provide real thorns, an enemy that attacks you will itself be wounded by a fraction of the damage that it inflicts. Upgrading this ring won\'t give any additional bonuses.

This strange ring is made of some sturdy stone. What you first thought was a ruby is actually liquid blood being held in place! Inside is an arrow pointing at what appears to be a wall, along with a broken heart... What might it do?
You have been immured in stone. Forever.
This exotic trinket is shrouded by aura of mystery. Who knows, what might happen to one who wears it?
You feel streams of energy, running through your hands while you holding it.
Chaotic powers flow through this crystal. Maybe it might be useful.
Yes! Now you know, that you can fuse it with one of your items, but what\'s next?
Choose place to set Chaos Mark
Choose item to fuse Chaos Crystal in
Crystal absorbed by rune inscribed on scroll, and now it is a %s
Crystal absorbs your weapon, and took the form of a Sword
Crystal absorbs your bow, and took the form of a Bow
Crystal absorbs your wand, and took the form of a Staff
Attacks are greatly increased for those filled with bloodlust, making them especially dangerous.
The rose looks beautiful but not very charming.
The acrid stench terrifies all other rodents around, making them flee from the skull bearer.
Hail the Lord of the rats, every rat shall obey and praise.
Gold crown of His Ratness, symbol of everrating Power
Bishop of the Holy Church of Santa the Depth Lord
Days and nights I pray for you my child.
I will pray for you my child.
May precision and evasion come for those touched by the blessing!
The dark art of mind control allows the caster to bend the will of most creatures
This cat is doing ordinary cat things
Welcome to the local Pixel-Mart branch.\nHow can I help you?
Some kind of weapon hanging on the board.
Various shields hanging on the board. It not for sale yet.
Some kind of armor on a hanger.
Some kind of potions on the shelf.
This is well made wooden table.
Bench, made of wood, looks uncomfortable to sit.
Wooden table with plain white tablecloth.
Pedestal with a holy book on it.
An elegant banner depicting the symbols of this tavern.
Looks like a very comfortable bed.
A reliable baking furnace, that was assembled according to traditional schemes.
This skull perfectly captures the moment of unexpected horror.
A regular stool made of resistant wood.
This stool has seen better days.
An impressive sized rack, on the shelves of which you can find various drinks and snacks.
Used to store such a valuable drink like wine.
Bottling beer has become a very popular pastime among innkeepers.
The steam that comes from the smouldering embers fills the room with pleasant aromas.
Welcome my son, welcome to the holy church of great Santa the Depth Lord!
Welcome my daughter, welcome to the holy church of great Santa the Depth Lord!
If you seek help, I can provide healing service only for %d gold coins!\nIf you are in search for holy Blessing, or, Lord forbid, was cursed, please meet with the Bishop in our humble church.
Wearing this armor allows the necromancer to use the \"Necrotism\" ability, which will spread a magic plague, which may infect any creature in the vicinity, dead or alive.
This robe is imbued with dark magic and will allow the Necromancer to consume souls of fallen monsters.
The mark of death itself, the reek from which affects the ones nearby and causes them to share the same plight.
This thin %s wand is warm to the touch. Who knows what it will do when used?
When this wand is used as a melee weapon, its average damage is %d points per hit.
You can use this wand as a melee weapon.
your wand fizzles; it must be out of charges for now
The purple light from this wand will make the target run amok, attacking random creatures in its vicinity.
When a discharge of this wand hits a wall (or any other solid obstacle) it causes an avalanche of stones, damaging and stunning all creatures in the affected area.
You crushed yourself with your own Wand of Avalanche...
This wand will allow you to teleport in the chosen direction. Creatures and inanimate obstructions will block the teleportation.
This wand emits a beam of destructive energy, which pierces all creatures in its way. The more targets it hits, the more damage it inflicts to each of them.
This wand unleashes bursts of magical fire. It will ignite flammable terrain, and will damage and burn a creature it hits.
You burned yourself with your own Wand of Firebolt...
A flick of this wand summons a flock of magic sheep, creating a temporary impenetrable obstacle.
This is a magic sheep. What\'s so magical about it? You can\'t kill it. It will stand in place until it magically fades away, all while chewing cud with a blank stare.
This wand conjures forth deadly arcs of electricity, which will deal damage to several creatures standing close to each other.
You zapped yourself with your own Wand of Lightning...
This wand launches missiles of pure magical energy, dealing moderate damage to a target.
You killed yourself with your own Wand of Magic Missile...
you disenchanted the Wand of Magic Missile and used its essence to upgrade your %s

The vile blast from this twisted bit of wood will coats its target with a deadly venom. The poisoned creature will suffer periodic damage until the effect ends. The duration of the effect increases with the level of the staff.
\"When life ceases new life always begins to grow... The eternal cycle always remains!\"
This wand will cause a creature to move and attack at half its ordinary speed until the effect ends
Waves of magic force from this wand will affect all cells on their way triggering traps, trampling high vegetation, opening closed doors and closing open ones. They also push back monsters.
You have magically transported %s into your backpack
A blast from this wand will teleport a creature against its will to a random place on the current level.
This portal will allow you to return to the town. It seems quite unstable, and probably won\'t stay active for too long.\nWould you like to use it?
This portal will take you back to the dungeon.\nWould you like to use it?
You haven\'t used the portal on this level. After leaving, you won\'t be able to use this portal again!\nAre you sure you want to leave?

Carvings on the surface of this portal are forming quite a peculiar pattern. It appears as if it\'s a giant tunnel leading into the distance. But looking at it from a side, it becomes obvious, that it\'s surface is almost flat.
The portal is oozing some sort of glowing matter. It looks perfectly still, if not for ripples coming from it\'s center.
You touched the portal and... nothing happened.
This portal will take to the first level of the %s.
The blood turns stone which merges with the walls nearby and makes traversing them much easier, but at what cost.
This sociologist is on a holy quest of collecting public opinions
"You already took part in this survey, please come back later"
"Hi!\nDid you want to take part in our survey?(Internet access will be required)\nYour opinion matters!"
"Sorry, but without access to the Internet you cannot pass our survey"
"Sorry, something went wrong, please try again later"
Seems like there is a library inside that building.
Seems like there is a fortune teller inside that building.
Seems like there is a cinema inside that building.
Seems like there is an inn inside that building.
This dart\'s tip is covered in healing potion.
This arrow\'s tip is covered in healing potion.
Solution on the tip of this dart will turn anyone into a mindless, merciless berserk.
Solution on tip of this arrow will turn anyone in mindless merciless berserk.
Looks like this cinema really tries to provide the best seats for it\'s customers.
This book looks like someone negligently left it
This mystery canvas is called a "screen" and it can show moving pictures
This stove gives some pleasurable warmth
This chair is made from wood
This ancient plate is covered by snow
Did you ever want to disguise as the famous Doge? Now\'s your chance!\nSuch Mask! Many Disguise! Wow!

Many heroes of all kinds ventured into the Dungeon before you. Some of them have returned with treasures and magical artifacts, most have never been heard of since. But none have succeeded in retrieving the Amulet of Yendor, which is told to be hidden in the depths of the Dungeon.\n\nYou consider yourself ready for the challenge, but most importantly, you feel that fortune smiles on you. It\'s time to start your own adventure!

You finally hold it in your hands, the Amulet of Yendor. Using its power you can take over the world or bring peace and prosperity to people or whatever. Anyway, your life will change forever and this game will end here. Or you can stay a mere mortal a little longer.
Welcome to the level %d of Remixed Dungeon!
Welcome back to the level %d of Remixed Dungeon!
Be cautious, since the dungeon is even more dangerous at night!
Your steps echo across the dungeon.
You hear the water splashing around you.
The smell of vegetation is thick in the air.
The atmosphere hints that this floor hides many secrets.
The pain snapped %s out of paralysis
OK, a deal is a deal, dat\'s what I can do for you: I can reforge 2 items and turn them into one of a better quality.

Oh yes! You are my hero!\nRegarding your reward, I don\'t have cash with me right now, but I have something better for you. This is my family heirloom ring: my granddad took it off a dead paladin\'s finger.
You won\'t know what\'s inside until you open it!
But to open it you need a golden key.
You can see %s inside, but to open the chest you need a golden key.
This ancient tomb may contain something useful, but its owner will most certainly object to checking.
This is all that\'s left from one of your predecessors. Maybe it\'s worth checking for any valuables.
You died, but you were given another chance to defeat this dungeon. Will you take it?
Yes! Yes!!! This is it! Please give it to me! And you can take one of these items, maybe they will be useful to you in your journey...
Yes! The ugly creature is slain and I can finally rest... Please take one of these items, maybe they will be useful to you in your journey...

The Dungeon lies right beneath the City, its upper levels actually constitute the City\'s sewer system. Being nominally a part of the City, these levels are not that dangerous. No one will call it a safe place, but at least you won\'t need to deal with much evil magic here.

Many years ago an underground prison was built here for the most dangerous criminals. At the time it seemed like a very clever idea, because this place indeed was very hard to escape. But soon dark miasma started to permeate from below, driving prisoners and guards insane. In the end the prison was abandoned, though some convicts were left locked up here.

The caves, which stretch down under the abandoned prison, are sparsely populated. They lie too deep to be exploited by the City and they are too poor in minerals to interest the dwarves. In the past there was a trade outpost somewhere here on the route between these two states, but it has perished since the decline of the Dwarven Metropolis. Only omnipresent gnolls and subterranean animals dwell here now.

The Dwarven Metropolis was once the greatest of dwarven city-states. In its heyday the mechanized army of dwarves had successfully repelled the invasion of the old god and his demon army. But it is said, that the returning warriors had brought seeds of corruption with them, and that victory was the beginning of the end for the underground kingdom.

In the past these levels were the outskirts of Metropolis. After the costly victory in the war with the old god dwarves were too weakened to clear them of remaining demons. Gradually demons have tightened their grip on this place and now it\'s called Demon Halls.\n\nVery few adventurers have ever descended this far...

Many, many years ago there was a rich mine, full of magical stone. But once mineral veins dried up the miners moved out, leaving behind wide network of tunnels. Eventually this place was populated by spiders. But even these dangerous creatures, lurking in the dark, wasn\'t enough to scare away the brave and insane ones longing for treasures that might be found in the mines. For the scale of danger is always proportional to the amount of rumours telling about magical artefacts. Once upon a time an evil witch wondered into the tunnels trying to escape from prosecutors. But superstitious people wouldn\'t dare to step into the darkness. So they decided to wait. But she never showed up. Maybe witch has found another way out, maybe she managed to slip by the guards... or she perished, surrounded by rustle of the creatures of the dark.
Oh, I see you have succeeded! I do hope it hasn\'t troubled you too much. As I promised, you can choose one of my high quality wands.
Select an item for the quickslot
Your pack is too full for the %s

The Amulet of Yendor is the most powerful known artifact of unknown origin. It is said that the amulet is able to fulfill any wish if its owner\'s will-power is strong enough to \"persuade\" it to do it.
This ancient symbol of immortality grants an ability to return to life after death. Upon resurrection all non-equipped items are lost.

Using this kit of small tools and materials anybody can transform any armor into an \"epic armor\", which will keep all properties of the original armor, but will also provide its wearer a special ability depending on his class. No skills in tailoring, leather-working or blacksmithing are required.
You applied the armor kit to upgrade your %s
You can store excess dew in this tiny vessel for drinking it later. If the vial is full, in a moment of deadly peril the dew will be consumed automatically.
The dew vial was emptied to heal your wounds.
You collected a dewdrop into your dew vial.
Collect gold coins to spend them later in a shop.
you wince as your grip involuntarily tightens around your %s
Lloyd\'s beacon is an intricate magic device, that allows you to return to a place you have already been.
Some kind of strong magic aura present here prevents you from using the lloyd\'s beacon!
The psychic aura of neighbouring creatures doesn\'t allow you to use the lloyd\'s beacon at this moment.
The lloyd\'s beacon is successfully set at your current location, now you can return here anytime.
\n\nThis beacon was set somewhere on the level %d of Remixed Dungeon.
This arcane stylus is made of some dark, very hard stone. Using it you can inscribe a glyph or a rune, but you have no power over choosing what it will be, the stylus will decide it for you.
Select an item to inscribe on
This worn leather book is not that thick, but you feel somehow, that you can gather a lot from it. Remember though that reading this tome may require some time.
You have chosen the way of the %s!
It\'s an indispensable item in The Demon Halls, which are notorious for their poor ambient lighting.
Using a weightstone, you can balance your melee weapon to increase its speed or accuracy.
you balanced your %s to make it faster
you balanced your %s to make it more accurate
How would you like to balance your %s?
This is a copper key ring, that lets you keep all your keys separately from the rest of your belongings.
You can place any number of scrolls into this tubular container. It saves room in your backpack and protects scrolls from fire.
This small velvet pouch allows you to store any number of seeds in it. Very convenient.
This slim holder is made of leather of some exotic animal. It allows to compactly carry up to %d wands.
This strong leather belt is capable of storing all your potions while protecting them from shattering due to frost.
The notches on this golden key are tiny and intricate. Maybe it can open some chest lock?
The notches on this ancient iron key are well worn; its leather lanyard is battered by age. What door might it open?
This key looks serious: its head is shaped like a skull. Probably it can open some serious door.
The ball of corpse dust doesn\'t differ outwardly from a regular dust ball. However, you know somehow that it\'s better to get rid of it as soon as possible.
Maybe because just holding it makes you feel anxious and angry.
This metal is called dark not because of its color (it doesn\'t differ from normal gold), but because it melts under the daylight, making it useless on the surface.
This rose dried up long time ago, but it has somehow kept all its petals.
And it hasn\'t lost it\'s charm. It looks so pretty, that you want to keep it forever.
Many dwarves and some of their larger creations carry these small pieces of metal of unknown purpose. Maybe they are jewelry or maybe some kind of ID. Dwarves are strange folk.
This is a large and sturdy tool for breaking rocks. It can be probably used as a weapon.
There is no dark gold vein near you to mine
It could be a nice hunting trophy, but it smells too bad to place it on a wall.
On the other hand, it demonstrates that owner is capable of killing rats, even big and smelly ones.
A cloud of confusion gas is swirling here.
Shafts of light pierce the gloom of the underground garden.
A cloud of paralytic gas is swirling here.
A greenish cloud of toxic gas is swirling here.
You died from breathing toxic gas..
The power of knowledge radiates from the water of this well. Take a sip from it to reveal all secrets of your equipped items.
As you take a sip, you feel the knowledge pour into your mind. You now know everything about your equipped items. Also, you sense all items on the level and know all of its secrets.
The power of health radiates from the water of this well. Take a sip from it to heal your wounds and satisfy hunger.
As you take a sip, you feel your wounds heal completely.
Power of change radiates from the water of this well. Throw an item into the well to turn it into something else.
Everything is covered with a thick web here.
Feel the amok, taking the lives of those unfortunate.
The body is covered by bark which blocks some damage taken.
The wounds are bleeding out rapidly.
Completely blinded, only the sounds around can be heard.
The body is engulfed in raging flames!
The mind and body was charmed!
The next attack will be a combo attack.
The body is crippled but the fight still goes on.
Frozen solid preventing from making any actions at all.
The eyes went bloody red from all that fury inside.
You\'re starving! You need to eat food!
Completely invisible, which can either help avoid dangers or become one.
The body hovers above the ground, avoiding traps and other earthly dangers.
Light emanates from the body, illuminating everything around.
The inner vision allows to clearly see the movement of all living beings on the floor.
Caustic ooze is eating away at the flesh!
The body is slowly getting killed by the poison!
The function for natural regeneration is in a buff form to make things easier.
Roots sprouting from the ground entangle the body, not allowing to make a single step.
It\'s harder to spot something among the shadows.
The sluggish feel makes one slower than usual.
The mark was made by a snipper.
Vivacity and energy emanates from the body, and movements feel faster than usual.
It looks like someone was very frightened.
The lightheaded feeling makes it harder to walk straight!
Weakness envelopes the body, which makes one an easier target.
The senses have sharpen, giving more awareness of the surroundings.
A veil of darkness surrounds the owner, summoning a spirit every time damage is taken.
Frost surrounds the body, which slows all that gets nearby.
You don\'t know what is there.

File not found. For some reason...
Our game crashed...\n Sorry.\nPlease sent crash report to help us fix it.
A mysterious figure shrouded by black mist.

Huh, why... oh, you see me, don\'t you? That means you\'re not one of \"them\". I see you\'re not fond of all these monsters as well. Tell you what, if you\'ll help me out with a little problem, then I will offer you my assistance. Somewhere on this level you will find a beast of darkness, a _Treacherous Spirit_. Slay it, take it\'s _heart_ and come back to me. And one more thing, if you are interested in purchasing my supplies, don\'t hesitate to ask
Help me and I\'ll help you.
Excellent. Here take this potion, surely, you will find it beneficial.
This monstrous creature looks like a cloud of living darkness. It\'s gigantic eye is stares at you, while pulsating with each movement you make.
A rat is not an uncommon sight in the dungeons, but for it to dwell so deep... You can see how the rat\'s whole body spasms when it moves.
A horrible beast that emerged from the rat\'s corpse bears no resemblance to a rodent or any other animal you ever saw. Enormous mouth, full of razor-sharp teeth, occupies most of it\'s body.
Gnoll-zombie has risen from the dead!
Black pulsating heart of the Treacherous Spirit.

It\'s an ancient artifact, crafted by first necromancers to collect souls of the fallen one\'s. Sensing your necromantic abilities it warded itself with a powerful spell. But since the spell is that of the old times, it\'s primitive structure is fairly easy to break.
You may break the spell. Or you may manipulate it\'s magical formula in a way, which will allow you to consume powers of both the spell and artifact itself, turning yourself into a Lich.

The _Lich_ is a necromancer who reached pinnacle of his abilities. Existing between life and death _Lich_ excels in necromancy, but his combat skills are greatly lower than those of an ordinary person.
Or if you _break the spell_ you\'ll be able to use this artifact as intended.
The Black Skull has been awakened!
The Black Skull has raised the dead monster to serve you!
The Black Skull is dormant, once more...

This armor will allow the Necromancer to summon up to two Deathlings at a cost of 5 souls each. These undead servants will follow their master and attack his foes. The Deathlings become stronger with each hero level.
Only necromancers can use this armor!
This robe will allow the Necromancer to summon a Deathling at a cost of 5 souls. The Deathling is an undead minion that grows stronger alongside their master.
The Deathling is a soul of a fallen hero who was unlucky enough to be summoned by a fellow adventurer, who practices necromancy.
You do not have enough souls to cast a \"%1$s\" spell.
Your powers reject death itself! But you lost all your collected souls and possessions.
You became a Lich! Your powers grow and your soul capacity has been doubled! But you lost %1$d points of strength.
To unlock this character class, slay the Lich with any other class.

This spirit seems to be struggling in his curse. It looks that it wants to ask me something. With the help of necromancy, I could convince him that the request was fulfilled. It will save me time. But is it worth doing so?
Yes, bend it to your will.
The sad ghost has been dominated!
Sacrifice your loyal minion to cause an explosion. The area covered by the explosion will depend on the servant\'s remaining health and your skill level.
You have no power over me!
Select your loyal servant to sacrifice!

Opening the tomb is a sinister act on it own, but not enough for someone serving Death itself. Performer of this Dark Ritual has a great chance (and it will grow with the performer\'s mastery) to subdue a poor soul of one lying here.
There is no grave here to perform an Exhumation.
Attempt to raise the latest (Ritual requires quite a fresh material) slain creature. When using this dark art, remember: almost any creature can be raised, but not everyone\'s will is easy to bend.
Raise Dead failed because there is no free space nearby.
You need to kill someone before attempting to raise it.
Raw fish, eat at your own risk
Frozen fish, looks like it\'s alive, but frozen.

Remixed Dungeon personalizes your advertising experience using Admob and Appodeal (further Ad providers). Ad providers and their partners may collect and process personal data such as device identifiers, demographic and interest data to provide advertising experience tailored to you. By consenting to this improved ad experience, you`ll see ads that Ad providers and their partners believe are more relevant to you.

By agreeing, you confirm that you are over the age of 16 and would like a personalized ad experience.
I will not go to dungeon barehanded!\nMaybe it\'s worth visiting the town shop first?

This is a ranged weapon. It is useless for everybody but elves at very close range. Having a bow equipped allows you to fire arrows.\n\n
This simple wooden bow might prove to be useful, once you find some arrows.
Arrows launched from this compound bow deal a great amount of damage and have improved accuracy over a wooden bow at the cost of some speed.
Only the greatest archers can use this ruby bow. Almost every arrow pierces through the enemy, leaving a huge hole in his body, but extreme force is needed to pull the bowstring.
Leather quiver suitable to hold any amount of arrows
Common wooden arrow with an iron head.
This arrow looks just like a normal one, other than a warm red light radiating from its head.
A drop of deadly poison shines on this arrow head.
This arrow is coated in curare.
You can feel a freezing aura emanating from the arrow head.
A pretty, pink, sparkly ribbon tied in a knot and attached to a hair pin.
Some people say that dungeons are to dark to wear those. And you say that those people just aren\'t cool enough.
A tall-crowned, narrow-brimmed hat. It\'s usually associated with Puritans, but you don\'t have to be religious to wear it. For some reason it has a label, that says "Solomon" on it.
It\'s a headdress in the shape of a truncated cone made out of red fabric, with a tassel attached to the top. And no, it doesn\'t make the world 3-dimensional.
Sometimes you want to wash off all that monster blood and dirt from yourself and just feel cute and fluffy... Or at the very least you can wear cute cat ears.

There is a belief that rabbits are born-in-lucky and that a person who obtains a part of the animal will be accompanied by luck inherent for the beast. On a second thought, being killed for the sake of your ears, from which decorations will be made, doesn\'t sound particularly lucky.

Back in the days Pumpkin people were a proud and thriving nation. But everything changed after humans came, leaving only ruins behind. And severed carved heads of long gone Pumpkin tribes serve as a reminder of those terrible events.
Conquering dungeons in the night must be a very tiring task. How about putting on this warm, cosy hat and just relax, and let the whole world wait.

A beautiful silk hat decorated with star ornaments. Back in the old times, some believed that the greatest wizards wore specially crafted clothing that increased their magical powers. This one, however doesn\'t actually increase your magical capabilities, but sure feels like it when you wear it.
Unable to connect to Google Play.
You can only wear 2 artifacts at a time.

This woman is dressed in a long, brightly colored robe. She looks surprisingly young for someone, who mastered arcane arts of fortune-telling. Coming closer, you can hear her mumbling, as she gazes into the crystal ball.
I do apologise, but you\'ve reached your current limit. But you\'ll be able to use our service again for every hero level you receive!
I can reveal secrets behind items, that you posses.\nOne identification will cost you %d coins.
Careful, you don\'t want to spend your money for nothing, right? There are no unidentified items in your inventory.
Please choose one of the categories below.
You watched %1$d out of %2$d times. You will get an additional opportunity to watch a movie for every new hero level reached.
A luxurious blue carpet, decorated with purple ornaments.
This table is covered with a silk cloth. You can see various tarot cards laid out in a peculiar order.
Looks like this block require %d points of strength to push
You died.\n Would you like to try again?

This creature is made of pure evil and impenetrable darkness. Many believe that he is the Old God himself, considering how powerful he is. While others assumes that he is but a guardian of the Old God\'s chambers.

If you'll allow, Remixed Dungeon will collect usage statistics. That data will be used to:
 - spot and fix various minor glitches ( in case of a critical error, the game will explicitly ask you to send a report )
 - game balance improvements
 - fix device specific performance issues
 - publish funny statistics facts from time to time
 You can change your decision at any time (click the charts icon at the title screen )

No one could even start thinking that it\'s just another regular statue. It\'s not just the red glowing eyes, but the fact that nobody would put an actual _%s_ on such thing.
Much like soldiers, spider guards are sworn to protect their kingdom. The guard\'s venom is used to immobilize their target, causing paralysis and making them an easy prey.

Amber spiders are mysterious and rare creatures that poses psychic powers similar to regular psi-spiders, but are much tougher physically. The name "amber" refers to the color of their giant brain-sacks, that are revealed before their victims as Amber Spiders strike using their powers.
Arr! Do you have the guts to join our lads !? Or are you just another land rat? I hope not, because this thing is only for pirates after all, uh, i mean.. Arr!
Are you sure, you want to delete this save state?
One does not simply leave Remixed Dungeon.
Welcome to level %d! Now you are healthier and more focused. It\'s easier for you to hit enemies and dodge their attacks.
This chest is locked and you don\'t have matching key
You don\'t have a matching key
Caustic ooze eats at your flesh. Wash it away!
A successful attack with a melee weapon allows the _Gladiator_ to start a combo, in which every next successful hit inflicts more damage.
When severely wounded, the _Berserker_ enters a state of wild fury significantly increasing his damage output.
After killing an enemy the _Warlock_ consumes its soul. It heals his wounds and satisfies his hunger.
When fighting with a wand in his hands, the _Battlemage_ inflicts additional damage depending on the current number of charges. Every successful hit restores 1 charge to this wand.
When performing a surprise attack, the _Assassin_ inflicts additional damage to his target.
The _Freerunner_ can move almost twice faster, than most of the monsters. When he is running, the Freerunner is much harder to hit. For that he must be unencumbered and not starving.
_Snipers_ are able to detect weak points in an enemy\'s armor, effectively ignoring it when using a missile weapon.
Having a strong connection with forces of nature gives _Wardens_ an ability to gather dewdrops and seeds from plants. Also trampling a high grass grants them a temporary armor buff.
Elven _Scouts_ are masters of stealth. Trampling high grass grants them a temporary invisibility buff. Also they are even faster than regular Elves.
Elven _Shamans_ can use wands as melee weapons. Successful hits have a chance to activate the wand\'s power on a target without using a charge.
Nothing puts you into the "Dungeoning" mood as much as the red silk hat of Santa, Lord of the Depths.
What could be more festive than a glowing red nose? Together with a pair of antlers, of course.

It was believed that Kobolds are nothing more but a legend. The ancestors of common gnolls, kobolds dwelled in the deepest and coldest caves. It is also told that their race mastered engineering and machinery long before dwarfs did.

Kobold Icemancers were the elite of society. Notable warriors, wizards and most importantly, scientists. Ancient ice-masters seized the art of commanding ice, creating complex mechanisms strengthened with special spells.
The cold spirit is the embodiment of frost, in it\'s purest form. Being a mindless clot of magical energy, he obeys the will of the mage who called him or instead acts accordingly to basic instincts.

Among all the elementals that exist in the dungeon, ice elementals can hardly be considered powerful, but they can truly be called one of the most dangerous ones. The frost aura that emits from their bodies can slow down any enemy.
Ice Guardians were created by the ancient kobolds to protect their caves. As long as the Guardian\’s core contains enough energy, he is able to reconstruct himself right in the heat of the battle.
Ice guardians were manufactured by ancient kobolds to protect their caves. Power stored within it\'s core allows Ice guardian to reconstruct itself as long it has enough energy.

Hey...Hey! You\'re that one adventurer thing, right? Help me out, pall, these damn militarists locked me up in here! They intend to reactivate an ancient weapon to conquer these human things on the surface! But considering how dangerous it is, I opposed it, but they just threw me out and locked me in a cage! I beg you to find the key to the cell, and in return, I will help you to the best of my ability.

Oh, thank you, thank you so much! How you managed to find the key? You... you destroyed the weapon?! That\'s incredible! You know what, I said I\'ll help you, and I think I know the best way to do it. I\'ll stick with you for a while. * Caged Kobold has turned into a candle
You gotta help me out, buddy
I hate everything about this cage
This gnoll has been frozen alive. Apparently, he had been in there for quite a while.
Dense frozen vegetation block the view.
Yet another awful statue... Oh wait that\'s a frozen gnoll.

The best way to celebrate the Dungeonmas, is to eat a piece of baked turkey. In order to celebrate the day when monsters invaded the dungeon. Which in the end, attracted an incredible amount of tourists and travelers from all around the world, improving the economic situation in the region.
This key seems to be made of ice, but it is as hard as steel.
This wand launches an ice bolt, dealing light damage to the target. There is also a chance to slow down or even freeze the enemy.
You killed yourself with your own Wand of Icebolt...
Usually, weapons made out of such soft metal as gold won\'t be considered more than decoration. Despite that, this blade seems to be able to cut through things pretty well.

It\'s truly hard to believe that, this magnificent statue isn\'t just another decoration, but a malicious creature waiting for an unsuspecting adventurer. At first glance you could\'ve sworn that it\'s _%s_ was just part of it\'s arm.
This middle aged man seems to be mildly annoyed and excited at the same time. He wears a composite armor made out of held together bone fragments.

Ah! It is such a rare sight! A fellow adventurer who is not just a lifeless corpse. Hardly believable! Oh... I beg my pardon, sometimes I get too excited. You see, I myself, am a necromancer. And even though, studying the dead and death itself is what I do for a living, seeing same things over and over again, eventually gets extremely exhausting. On the other hand that\'s exactly why I am here. According to my calculations, in just a couple of weeks, somewhere in this very dungeon, something spectacular is going to happen. The _Necropolis_, an ancient city of the dead is going to open it\'s doors. And... I can\'t really say to much, I wasted enough time as it is. I need to get ready, _come back later_.
So little time, so little time...
I can hear the call of the dead.
Something special is hidden inside the Necropolis.
You are now familiar enough with your %1$s to identify it. It is %2$s.
Interaction of different types of magic has negated the enchantment on this weapon!
Its average damage is %d points per hit.
Its typical average damage is %1$d points per hit and usually it requires %2$d points of strength.
This weapon is probably too heavy for you.
It was balanced to make it faster.
It was balanced to make it more accurate.
Because of your inadequate strength the accuracy and speed of your attack with this %s is decreased.
Because of your excess strength the damage of your attack with this %s is increased.
You hold the %1$s at the ready%2$s.
, and because it is cursed, you are powerless to let go
You can feel a malevolent magic lurking within %s.
The enormous steel head of this battle axe puts considerable heft behind each stroke.
A simple iron dagger with a well worn wooden handle.
A polearm consisting of a sword blade on the end of a pole.
A piece of iron shaped to fit around the knuckles.
This towering blade inflicts heavy damage by investing its heft into every cut.
The iron head of this weapon inflicts substantial damage.
A staff of hardwood, its ends are shod with iron.
It is indeed quite short, just a few inches longer, than a dagger.
you reforged the short sword to upgrade your %s
you can\'t upgrade a boomerang this way
A slender wooden rod tipped with sharpened iron.
The razor-sharp steel blade shines reassuringly.
Few creatures can withstand the crushing blow of this towering mass of lead and steel, but only the strongest of adventurers can use it effectively.
Yes, I know what I\'m doing
Do you really want to equip it as a melee weapon?
\n\nAverage damage of this weapon equals to %d points per hit.
Because of your inadequate strength the accuracy and speed of your attack with this %s is decreased.
Because of your excess strength the damage of your attack with this %s is increased.
When thrown at the enemy this flat, curved, wooden missile will return to the hands of its thrower.
These evil little darts don\'t do much damage, but they can paralyze the target leaving it helpless and motionless for some time.
These simple metal spikes are ideally weighted to accurately pierce their prey.
The spike on each of these darts is designed to pin it to its target while the unstable compounds strapped to its length burst into brilliant flames.
This length of metal is weighted to keep the spike at its tip foremost as it sails through the air towards its victim
Star-shaped pieces of metal with razor-sharp blades do significant damage to their targets. They can be thrown at a very high rate.
While this throwing axe is not that heavy, yet still it requires significant strength to be used effectively.
This weapon consists of a sickle on a metal chain with a heavy iron weight at the other end.

The blade of this sword is made of pure chaos and it mildly vibrates sometimes. Great powers, stored inside this weapon can cut in half almost anything. Although, great skills are needed, to cope the mighty force of the weapon.
A dreadful Bow filled with the power of Chaos. Each arrow it shoots will carry piece of chaos energy within it. But if you miss...
Staff imbued with Power Of Chaos! What else a mage can dream or fear of?

At first glance this aged bronze sword, covered with patina stains, looks absolutely useless. But some sort of old, archaic powers sleeps inside. Those powers can turn almost any creature to will-less slave. Just need find a right way to wake them...
When read aloud, this scroll will summon one of the monsters from the current dungeon level. And if the monster\'s will is weak enough, it will become your servant.
A powerful magic prevents you from using \"%s\".
The will of a \"%s\" is to strong to control!
There is no suitable cell nearby.
You hear something died in the distance
These huge arachnid-like demonic creatures avoid close combat by all means, firing crippling serrated spikes from long distances.
Marsupial rats are aggressive, but rather weak denizens of the sewers. They can be dangerous only in big numbers. This particular rat seems to be an albino. It also has abnormally sharp teeth.

Deeper levels of the dungeon have always been a hiding place for all kinds of criminals. Not all of them could keep a clear mind during their extended periods so far from daylight. Long ago, these crazy thieves and bandits have forgotten who they are and why they steal. This bandit seems to have coated his dagger with something!
These brisk and tenacious inhabitants of cave domes may defeat much larger opponents by replenishing their health with each successful attack.
Brutes are the largest, strongest and toughest of all gnolls. When severely wounded, they go berserk, inflicting even more damage to their enemies.
These huge crabs are at the top of the food chain in the sewers. They are extremely fast and their thick exoskeleton can withstand heavy blows.

This machine was created by the Dwarves several centuries ago. Later, Dwarves started to replace machines with golems, elementals and even demons. Eventually it led their civilization to the decline. The DM-300 and similar machines were typically used for construction and mining, and in some cases, for city defense.
Wandering fire elementals are a byproduct of summoning greater entities. They are too chaotic in their nature to be controlled by even the most powerful demonologist.
One of this demon\'s other names is \"orb of hatred\", because when it sees an enemy, it uses its deathgaze recklessly, often ignoring its allies and wounding them.

Gnolls are hyena-like humanoids. They dwell in sewers and dungeons, venturing up to raid the surface from time to time. Gnoll scouts are regular members of their pack, they are not as strong as brutes and not as intelligent as shamans.

The Dwarves tried to combine their knowledge of mechanisms with their newfound power of elemental binding. They used spirits of earth as the \"soul\" for the mechanical bodies of golems, which were believed to be most controllable of all. Despite this, the tiniest mistake in the ritual could cause an outbreak.

Little is known about The Goo. It\'s quite possible that it is not even a creature, but rather a conglomerate of substances from the sewers that gained rudiments of free will. Either way, it\'s obvious dark magic is at work here.

The last king of dwarves was known for his deep understanding of the processes of life and death. He had persuaded members of his court to participate in a ritual, that should have granted them eternal youthfulness. In the end he was the only one who got it - and an army of undead as a bonus.
You cannot kill me, %s... I am... immortal...
These undead dwarves, risen by the will of the King of Dwarves, were members of his court. They appear as skeletons with a stunning amount of facial hair.
Mimics are magical creatures which can take any shape they wish. In dungeons they almost always choose the shape of a treasure chest, because they know how to beckon an adventurer.
Mimics are magical creatures which can take any shape they wish. This one looks like a big tasty pasty
These monks are fanatics, who devoted themselves to protecting their city\'s secrets from all aliens. They don\'t use any armor or weapons, relying solely on the art of hand-to-hand combat.
%1$s has knocked the %2$s from your hands!
These carnivorous fish are not natural inhabitants of underground pools. They were bred specifically to protect flooded treasure vaults.
Marsupial rats are aggressive, but rather weak denizens of the sewers. They can be dangerous only in big numbers.
These huge arachnid-like demonic creatures avoid close combat by all means, firing crippling serrated spikes from long distances.

These monks are fanatics, who devoted themselves to protecting their city\'s secrets from all aliens. They don\'t use any armor or weapons, relying solely on the art of hand-to-hand combat. This particular monk has mastered the art of disabling hiss opponents.
Shadows silently wander through the ruins of the ancient prison, only occasionally showing themselves to adventurers, usually in their latest adventure.
The most intelligent gnolls can master shamanistic magic. Gnoll shamans prefer battle spells to compensate for lack of might, not hesitating to use them on those who question their status in a tribe.
Brutes are the largest, strongest and toughest of all gnolls. When severely wounded, they go berserk, inflicting even more damage to their enemies. This brute is wearing a gigantic shield!

Skeletons are composed of corpses bones from unlucky adventurers and inhabitants of the dungeon, animated by emanations of evil magic from the depths below. After they have been damaged enough, they disintegrate in an explosion of bones.
You were killed by the explosion of bones...

These greenish furry cave spiders try to avoid direct combat, preferring to wait in the distance while their victim, entangled in the spinner\'s excreted cobweb, slowly dies from their poisonous bite.
You would think that it\'s just another ugly statue of this dungeon, but its red glowing eyes give itself away. While the statue itself is made of stone, the _%s_, it\'s wielding, looks real.
The succubi are demons that look like seductive (in a slightly gothic way) girls. Using its magic, the succubus can charm a hero, who will become unable to attack anything until the charm wears off.
The deadly swarm of flies buzzes angrily. Every non-magical attack will split it into two smaller but equally dangerous swarms.
Tengu are members of the ancient assassins clan, which is also called Tengu. These assassins are noted for extensive use of shurikens and traps.

Deeper levels of the dungeon have always been a hiding place for all kinds of criminals. Not all of them could keep a clear mind during their extended periods so far from daylight. Long ago, these crazy thieves and bandits forgot who they are and why they steal.
When dwarves\' interests shifted from engineering to arcane arts, warlocks came to power in the city. They started with elemental magic, but soon switched to demonology and necromancy.
A wraith is the vengeful spirit of a sinner, whose grave or tomb was disturbed. Being an ethereal entity, it is very hard to hit with a regular weapon.

Yog-Dzewa is an Old God, a powerful entity from the realms of chaos. A century ago, the ancient dwarves barely won the war against its army of demons, but were unable to kill the god itself. Instead, they then imprisoned it in the halls below their city, believing it to be too weak to rise ever again.
This fragile egg is pulsating briefly, inside it you can see something of many legs.
This cocoon is made of thinnest silk and it conceals something alive.
Soldiers happens to be the most numerous units of spider lair. Born to protect it\'s territory. Soldiers\'s chelicerae developed venomous glands to poison his enemies.
Hard workers during peaceful times, these creatures won\'t hesitate to charge to their enemies and grab first plant they run across, turning themselves into living bombs.
These seemingly fragile spiders possess unique mental powers, which allows them to control whole colony. Psi-Spider able to control any living creature, but he is quite a coward.

A body of beautiful woman crossed with hideous spider. Every living being in this lair is her servant. Meeting this extraordinary lady may turn out to be a deadly experience. Because you are trespasser!
Water elementals can be found near big water masses. Typically, these magically bonded waves just wander around.
Air elementals are flying magic beings made of living air.
Earth elementals are earth masses driven by concentrated nature forces.
Big shining crystal floating in the air. Probably it is filled with powerful magic.

This armor is made of old spider chitin and some kind of clothing. Most surprisingly, it seems that it still contains functioning spider glands. If you press the plates hard enough, then they shoot out web. And jagged soles allow you to move freely on such type of web.

A small obsidian skull. It was the source of the Necropolis powers, but after the Lich\'s defet it seems to have lost all it\'s powers. However, when you hold it in your hands a strange thought crosses your mind: \" It hungers \".
The skull pulsates with power, and you can see how it pours from it\'s empty eye sockets. And while holding it in your hands you hear a terrifying voice: \" Behold the march of death \".
It\'s a shard taken from the remains of the Jar of Souls. It shimmers with mysterious power, maybe there is someone who might be interested in something like this.

At first glance, this is a mighty warrior in heavy armor, and only a dead grin gives him away. The death knight is a manifestation of the soul of a knight who failed to pursue his vows. And in his cursed state, he will always wander seeking to purge in battle, killing the innocent, unable to remember who he swore to protect.

The dread knight is an ancient warrior who, in life, neither knew good or righteousness. For his sins, he is doomed to everlasting wanderings in this broken body of death. And every moment of his tormented existence is full of pain and suffering, similar to what he inflicted on his victims.
You can almost see through this ghostly apparition. And although it looks like a skull, sometimes for a split second a face appears, filled with pain and suffering.
This floating, burning skull seems extremely fragile, and looks like it\'s going to burst into pieces at any second.
The glowing eyes of a skull depicted on this old jar, as well as the strange energy it emits, makes you feel uneasy.

The necromancer has met his death in the depths of the necropolis, and gradually, the evil forces that were flowing into his body turned him into a Lich. A death wizard, a will-less puppet, controlled by malicious forces ...
For something artificially created, this skull resembles too much of a real one. You can also see a faint glow surrounding it.

The dungeon was always a dangerous place to start with and many adventurers have met their doom here. But lives of the most unlucky ones ended up in the Necropolis, and now they are doomed to wander in these halls in form of a rotting corpses.

Ah! A fellow adventurer who is not just another lifeless corpse. Hardly believable ! Oh... I beg my pardon, sometimes I get too excited. You see, I myself, am a necromancer. And even though, studying the dead bodies and death itself is highly valued for us, all this monotony, sooner or later can get anyone bored. On the other hand that\'s exactly why I am here. The other day something big happened ! The _Necropolis_, an ancient city of the dead opened it\'s doors for us to gaze at. To be honest, we are standing right next to these doors. And ... you know what, take the key and go first, you love all kinds of adventures, don\'t you? And I\'ll go next ... just need to get ready first.
This weapon is made out of a special metal alloy, making it a lot lighter compared to a regular dagger.
It\'s a complex construction made out of magical ice. A glowing stone is placed inside this wondrous invention.
This ring is carved from magical ice. It\'s wearer is protected by a frost aura, slowing and damaging the attacking enemies.
A shard of the Spider Queen\'s carapace. You can see a piece of a spider gland inside of it, looking almost as if alive.

H-hello. Welcome to the Library. Here you can find the information about all sort of things, that can be found in the dungeon... actually we can only provide knowledge that was discovered by adventurers. It... it\'s kind of embarrassing. So each time you visit us, probably, there will be new things to read.
This tome is really huge. It holds all the knowledge, that adventurers have discovered and brought from the dungeon.
Do you really want to step on this trap? You can probably die.
All potions, scrolls, rings & wands identified
Death from fire, poison, toxic gas & hunger
Goo has been slain by all classes
DM-300 has slain by all subclasses
Amulet of Yendor obtained by all classes
Level completed without killing any monsters
Monster killed by a Grim weapon
Warm and cosy ushanka hat, decorated with a classy red star. A perfect companion for a comrade fighting against the evil and cold dungeon.
This mask is made out of an all natural vampire skull. In fact it is a vampire skull... skull of a big-headed vampire. Creepy.
Have you ever wished to look like an undead hero, who failed his quest repeatedly? Well here\'s your chance.
This candy looks so pretty and it smells good too. Do you really need to give it to someone else?
You shouldn\'t have eaten that candy. You promised to give it to someone else. It doesn\'t seem to affected you in any way though, your hunger wont go away, it\'s just candy after all.
Now you really had to much. Your tummy hurts because you ate to much candy.
A delicious pumpkin pie, just like your mom used to bake.
No matter how good it was while fresh, there is no way it\'s still edible.
Looks like a regular candle, not something you would expect to find in a dangerous dungeon. Weirdly enough it\'s rather warm to the touch, despite the fact that it wasn\'t lit yet.
The candle lighted up the moment you took it out of your backpack. The flame emits a faint purple light, and as you look through it, all nearby monsters become visible to you.
The candle has burned out, it no longer lights up when you hold it. Looks like you can\'t use it anymore.
Looks like a simple wooden barrel. But as you get closer to it, you can smell a faint hint of oil. The barrel seems to be fairly light, you might be able to push it.
It is very strange and rather creepy to see a carved pumpkin lying on the dungeon floor. You clearly sense incoming danger from it. But you can always push it away, right?
There is no doubt... this scarecrow is watching your every move. It\'s red glowing eyes pierce right through you, but surprisingly enough, you don\'t feel threatened by it.

Why hello little boy, how do you do?
I've got something exciting for you!

Oh how grateful would I be,
If you go and collect some candies for me!

Why hello little girl, how do you do?
I've got something exciting for you!

Oh how grateful would I be,
If you go and collect some candies for me!
Five candies is all I need.\nOh, the reward will be so sweet!
Oh jolly, oh my!\nFor this, you\'ll get a sweet slice of pie!
%s is not ready for use yet
An exceptional example of elven craftsmanship. It\'s clearly more effective and accurate than a regular wooden bow.
A small, filthy piece of flesh and fur. Can these actually be of use to someone?
A leather armor made of rat hide. It\'s probably not contagious...
The whole body of this humpbacked person is hidden under a leather jumpsuit. Also, from him comes a bitter smell of medicine and ... garlic?

Bah! Can you believe it?! Those idiots still haven\'t realized how dangerous this damn sewer is! Like guards and adventurers can protect the town from anything. Hah! No weapon can stop the disease from spreading. But I need evidence, maybe you can help me with that? Bring me %d rat hides, so that I can do some additional tests.

Bah! Can you believe it?! Those idiots still haven\'t realized how dangerous this damn sewer is! Like guards and adventurers can protect the town from anything. Hah! No weapon can stop the disease from spreading. But I need evidence, maybe you can help me with that? Bring me %d rat hides, so that I can do some additional tests.
Ah, thank you, I hope these will have some trace of disease. Previous examples were absolutely harmless. So I made this for you while I was waiting for new samples.
I\'ll show them, I\'ll show them all!
One of the locals. Even though this is clearly a commoner, those clothes do look expensive.
Do you know about that special service the \"movie theater\" provides? Too bad they ask for some exotic thing called the \"Internet\", I never even heard about such a thing.
A very shy person, wearing an awkward looking sweater and a thick pair of glasses.
I... I am sorry, l-library isn\'t open... yet.
One of the locals. Even though this is clearly a commoner, those clothes do look expensive.
I am sorry, but this building is not ready yet!
A very posh looking girl. Her whole appearance tells you \"I am to good for everyone.\"
I bear no interest in such plebs as yourself!
Why hello there handsome, what do you have over there. Ah, such an exquisite amulet! And you... you stand above those plebs. What if we take a walk and discuss our mutual future?
Why hello there cutie pie, why do you have over there. Ah, such an exquisite amulet! And you... you shine so much brighter compared to anyone. What if we take a walk and discuss our mutual future?
I am sorry, you cannot use our service right now. (Internet connection required)
A well-mannered adventurer should not invade private property, without an invitation of course.
Sorry, the movie is not ready yet, you may try again in a few minutes.
I do apologise, but every new adventurer can watch only %d movies total.
Something went wrong and we couldn\'t get your reward delivered...
You has successfully watched a \"reward\" video!
An incredibly warm and fluffy costume. Whoever puts on this costume will look like... someone who is trying to disguise as a gnoll. But gnolls won\'t fall for it, they will still attack you.
One of the many books that can be found in any library
This wand emits dark, malicious energy.
Thanks to adventurers like you, it became really peaceful up here.
You think there are too many guards in this town? Well, that\'s because this is the only town with a gigantic monster-infested dungeon, isn\'t it?
One of the locals. Even though this is clearly a commoner, those clothes do look expensive.
Ah! Another adventurer, lovely! Make sure to loot as many valuables as you can!
Town became so wealthy thanks to that dungeon, that everyone in town can afford to go on a vacation whenever we please! In fact that\'s why there is so few people in here right now.
I hope the sewers won\'t get flooded when spring arrives. We don\'t need another rat infestation.
An old man, somehow he looks like someone who would be making wands.
Come back anytime you feel sick or hungry!
I wonder why the church doesn\'t allow us to wear hats... it\'s really cold out here.
A regular worker of the local establishments.
This guy is a typical shopkeeper. You can tell he already knows your price.
Come back any time, we are always happy to see you!
Greetings and welcome to our movie theater! We provide a special service, where you can watch a movie for free. And if you watch through all of it, you will be rewarded with %d gold coins!

Welcome my son, welcome to the holy church of great Santa the Depth Lord! Unfortunately I cannot let you pass through right now, because the building is under reconstruction, but if you seek help, I can provide healing service and food only for %d gold coins!

Welcome my daughter, welcome to the holy church of great Santa the Depth Lord! Unfortunately I cannot let you pass through right now, because the building is under reconstruction, but if you seek help, I can provide healing service and food only for %d gold coins!
A simple wall made of wood logs.
Despite the fame of this place among adventurers, there is surprisingly a lot of snow here. It seems that very few walk along these streets
A solid silver cross, a symbol of the local religion - \"The Witnesses of Santa the Depth Lord\".
A typical church bell. It looks like no one ringed it for quite a long time and even the rope is missing.
Traditionally church bells are installed in tall towers so that the ringing could be heard from a greater distance.
Stone chimney - a rightful companion for every housing, that is raised there, where freezing weathers are a common guest.
What in world could be behind that door?
Snowman is a traditional town decoration for the holiday season, placed in this place especially to celebrate \"Dungeonmas\" a day, when monsters invaded the dungeon.
A strange feeling arises while looking at this living and such peaceful tree. After all, not so far away lies a dungeon filled with horrors and death.
Somehow this wall emits heat and seems a bit wet.
Seems like there is a shop inside that building.
This floor made of simple wooden planks. What exactly are you looking for?
Luxurious red carpet reserved for special guests.
This door seems exceptionally well made. It probably leads to something incredible.
I don\'t want to sound weird, but by doing so, you are literally feeding the developers.
Additionally you will receive every single hat from the in-app store! As well as every single hat that is going to be ever released.
This parchment is covered with indecipherable writing, and bears a title of rune %s. Who knows what it will do when read aloud?
You can\'t read a scroll while blinded
Do you really want to cancel this scroll usage? It will be consumed anyway.
Just a blank scroll. Maybe something can write on it?
When read aloud, this scroll will unleash a challenging roar that will awaken all monsters and alert them to the reader\'s location.
The scroll emits a challenging roar that echoes throughout the dungeon!
Permanently reveals all of the secrets of a single item.
A soothing melody will put all creatures in your field of view into a deep sleep, giving you a chance to flee or make a surprise attack on them.
The scroll utters a soothing melody.
The scroll utters a soothing melody and the %s falls asleep!
The scroll utters a soothing melody and the monsters fall asleep!

When this scroll is read, an image of crystal clarity will be etched into your memory, alerting you to the precise layout of the level and revealing all hidden secrets. The locations of items and creatures will remain unknown.
You are now aware of the level layout.
The incantation on this scroll will create illusionary twins of the reader, which will chase his enemies.

This scroll contains destructive energy, that can be psionically channeled to inflict a massive damage to all creatures within a field of view. An accompanying flash of light will temporarily blind everybody in the area of effect including the reader of the scroll.
The raw magical power bound up in this parchment will, when released, recharge all of the reader\'s wands to full power.
a surge of energy courses through your pack, recharging your wand
a surge of energy courses through your pack, recharging your wands
a surge of energy courses through your pack, but nothing happens
The incantation on this scroll will instantly strip from the reader\'s weapon, armor, rings and carried items any evil enchantments that might prevent the wearer from removing them.
Your pack glows with a cleansing light, and a malevolent energy disperses.

Weapons and armor will also require less strength to use, and any curses on the item will be lifted.

This scroll will upgrade a melee weapon, improving its quality. In contrast to a regular Scroll of Upgrade, this specialized version will never destroy an enchantment on a weapon. On the contrary, it is able to imbue an unenchanted weapon with a random enchantment.

Defeated, shattered in pieces, but not completely destroyed, the Old God was sealed away in the deepest levels of the dungeon. But recently the seal was broken, leaving passage, to the demon\'s nest, wide open. The nightmarish monsters, created by the Old God in his slumber was so numerous, that provided no way to escape they were forced to fuse together to form these grotesque halls. And as you walk upon their living flesh you can feel the beat of an Old God\'s heart echoing through them.

And created Watabou Pixel Dungeon. And he looked at his handiwork. And he saw that it was good!
Bounce Glyph - Causes enemies to be pushed back after hitting the Hero.
Affection Glyph - The enemy will be charmed for few turns, while the Hero will be charmed for a few turns too, but never more than the enemy.
Anti-entropy Glyph - The Hero will be illuminated and catch fire, and the enemy will be frozen.
Multiplicity Glyph - This effect causes the Hero to spawn a mirror image but be damaged. This can kill the Hero.
Potential Glyph - This unleashes a lightning-style blast that will damage the enemy which attacked the player and will damage the Hero on average half the damage done to the enemy.
Metabolism Glyph - The Hero will be partially healed before the enemy damage is applied, but hunger will increase considerably. Only works if not starving,.
Stench Glyph - The Hero will release a cloud of toxic gas when hit.
Viscosity Glyph - The hero will obtain the damage deferred debuff, which will cause the Hero to receive 1 damage per turn, instead of receiving the whole amount in one shot.
Displacement Glyph - Whenever the Hero is hit, there is a chance that the Hero will be teleported to a random visible tile. This glyph does not work on boss levels.
Entanglement Glyph - The hero may receive herbal armor, but also be rooted at the same time.
Grim weapon - On successful hit, may instantly kill the target (or deal up to 2x damage to a boss).
Blazing weapon - On successful hit, deals extra damage to target and may burn it.
Eldritch weapon - On successful hit, enemy may flee in Terror.
Unstable weapon - On successful hit, may apply the effect of any random enchantment.
Vampiric weapon - On successful hit, may heal the Hero for part of the damage dealt to the enemy.
Lucky weapon - almost completely ignores enemy armor, and does much more damage.
Stunning weapon - On successful hit, may paralyze target.
Piercing weapon - On successful hit, may damage all enemies in a straight line behind the target.
Venomous weapon - On successful hit, may poison target.
Chilling weapon - On successful hit, may slow target and will prevent it from burning.
Wild weapon - On successful hit, may damage all enemies adjacent to the target.

She stopped, frozen, at the heavy oaken door, and eyed the light emerging from the door's borders. From some neglected corner of her mind, recognition.
 "Sunlight.." she muttered to herself. How long had it been? In the eternal gloom of the Dungeon, she had long ago given up on tracking the days. The light illuminated disused memories. She remembered her training, long days of arduous practice with 'rang and blade, of log keeping, and map making. She remembered the mantras and disciplines intended to allow her to retain some semblance of sanity as she plumbed the unknown depths. What she didn't remember, couldn't remember, were people.
 She remembered their voices, their commands, and their warnings, but not their faces, nor their touch.
 Pain had trained her. Remember the dangers, always the dangers. Rabid animals, undead, insane brigands, and cunning ninjas had fallen before her. She had cut, burned, stabbed, and poisoned her way through abominations, demons, clockwork abominations, and insane necromancers. Even Gods had fallen before her.
 She had tracked Yog through Heaven and Hell, before silencing his corrupting whispers forever. Even then, there was work to be done. Yog was a servant of one even more occult and powerful than himself.
 So she delved further, deeper. The old wizard's journal, still radiating power, had shown her the path. With the magic in it's pages, she traveled to a wild new land, a tiny village ensconced in a mighty forest. There, she finally tracked the evil to its labyrinthine source, and vanquished all who stood before her.
 Now, in the faint daylight, she examined herself in a pool of cavewater. Her body was warped almost beyond recognition by magic. Her skin, pale to he point of translucency, was caked with dirt, grime, and soot. Her necklace of rings could pay a kings ransom, and her holster of wands contained enough magical energy to lay waste to armies. She gripped her weapons, literally fine enough to cut down the very gods. Truly, she had become master of this dark realm, this wasteland of despair.
 She had chased evil to the far corners of the multiverse, but now she was paralyzed with fear. What if they reject her? What if they don't? How could she interact with these people anymore? Hell, she had lost count of the times death had claimed her, only to be pulled from its icy grasp.
 No, there was no place for her in the light, not anymore. She turned from the meager light, and descended into the dark, perhaps for the last time.

A pile of extremely heavy stones, looks unmovable.
Have you ever wondered how it would feel to take a more sinister role while Dungeoneering? Well, you will most certainly bring horror to the local baby rats with this devil-like appearance.
I used to be an adventurer like you,\nBut then i took an arrow in the knee...

My wife and I live all alone,
In a little log hut, we called our own
She loved gin, and I loved rum
I tell you what we'd lots of fun.
Much like soldiers, spider guards are sworn to protect their kingdom. The elite guard\'s venom is used to disorient their target.
Mutants have always been treated with contempt and fear, but the absence of hunger will once again give you superiority, this time in conquering the depths of the dungeon.
It is still not known who were your parents, but the natural troll-like regeneration will help mend all the upcoming battle scars.
A deep and thorough study of nature as a source of energy will allow you to replenish your magical reserves during the journey.
Tightening the belt made of ogre skin, which was passed down to each new generation, you make a step towards the unknown that lies ahead.
The food and water had long gone rotten, driving every adventurer insane from thoughts of death by fear and hunger. Can your diet help you last long enough?
One\'s offense is the best defense. Following these teachings, you venture into the dungeon, with faith being the strongest guardian of your body.
As an adherent of the natural regeneration of the human body, you have always been wary of potions that have remedial properties. Better safe than sorry!

The lands around the dungeon are long infected by malice, preventing the growth of seeds for various herbs and plants. Who knows how long it will take before the last plant will cease existence on these barren lands.
An evil presence is lurking among the minds of all the creatures in the dungeon, making them aware of events that occur with one another.
The first thing that came with evil, was a dense and impenetrable fog, which makes it almost impossible to clearly navigate the endless hallways of the dungeon.
The ancient art of rune reading is forbidden and avoided at all costs, due to the curse bestowed on each scroll that finds its way into the dungeon or its surroundings.
You got used to the fact, that possession and use of weaponry is morally not right, yet what else can defend you from the creatures roaming down below?
The function for mana regeneration is in a buff form to make things easier.
